attributes.about_this_biz_history: Zagat rated 'Excellent' we are proud to be a part of Chaberton's history in Langley.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: Located in South Langley, the Zagat rated Bacchus Bistro is part of local estate winery, Domaine de Chaberton. Serving authentic french bistro cuisine made with local ingredients paired with award winning 100% BC wines from Chaberton and Canoe Cove. Seasonal patio overlooking the vineyard. Combine a winery tour/tasting with a relaxing lunch or dinner. A mini vacation and only 45 minutes from Vancouver.

attributes.about_this_biz_bio:
Where It All Began

First, I will share what God has allowed me to know and tell you a little history about me. My childhood was generally perfect and almost like any other girl. Still, when I grew up, my body was changing and reacting very differently from regular to hard food intolerances; I realized that I needed something different. Frankly, seeing people eat “normal” but not me caused me to get depressed many times. As a result, I did plenty of research to find a cure and discovered unique diets which motivated me to make low-carb and gluten-free breads and desserts. Now, I see a lot of difference in my digestion and mood. So now, I am inspired to help people who do not have many options to take care of their health by eating delicious, nourishing desserts. Hence, it gives me great joy to cook those goodies with unique characteristics you can enjoy!
attributes.about_this_biz_history: Yummy Hope Bakery was lovely created to help people who have struggled with diabetes, celiac disease and dairy intolerance to live a normal life with their loved ones, friends, colleagues, or strangers. Nowadays, many men and women just like me and you cannot eat conventional or quotidian healthy food without dealing with substances and ingredients that can affect their body permanently in many ways.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: Gluten-Free, Vegan and Diabetes Friendly Desserts and Treats!

Estate Grill, located at the beautiful Poppy Estate Golf Course, provides delicious casual eats! Great place to grab a cup of coffee to chat with neighbours and friends together or stop by for a hearty breakfast or lunch. Sit back and enjoy the beautiful scenery of the landscaped greens of the golf course! 

We are open Tuesday Til Sunday, 9am-3pm.
